synopsis.text: Oikawa Shin, Junya Sasaki, Itsuki Katagiri, and Chizuru Sawamura, Kanade is determined to make his mark in the idol industry. The Dream Festival is their ticket to stardom, but they must first gather as many Dorika Cards from their fans as possible to secure their spot on stage. With fierce competition from other idols, including the popular duo Kuropune, the journey to the top is filled with challenges. Will Kanade and his fellow idols be able to rise to the occasion and make their dreams come true? Join them on their exciting journey to find out in Dream Festival!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
